title: Recreational Areas, Public Transportation Available, Heated Garages
posting_body: ['Life at The Vantage is like nothing else in northeastern Ohio!', 'Our resort-like apartment community is ideally located a short drive from downtown Cleveland and just off I-271, making it getting around the Cleveland area easy.', 'Convenience is key at The Vantage, with Beachwood Place shopping mall located directly across the street and the Cleveland Clinic just minutes away.', 'Property Amenities:', 'Heated Underground Walkways', 'Heated Garages', 'Anthea Spa', 'Clubhouse and Monthly Resident Events', 'Intercoms', 'Public Transportation Available', 'Gated Community with Controlled Access', 'The Hair Loft', 'Indoor and Outdoor Pool', 'Swerve Grille', 'Sauna and Whirlpool Spa', 'Recreational Areas', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of your exact home.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!', 'Professionally managed by GoldOller Real Estate Investments, a provider of Fair Housing and Equal Opportunity.']
